"Great experience, awesome people, fair prices." "Set up time and completed work quickly and worked well with insurance" "Everything they promised was delivered, on schedule and exactly as discussed."

We had a great experience with Conrad Roofing for our roof replacement. Mr, Conrad and the people that installed the new roof were very professional, and delivered what they promised. They responded quickly to any questions or issues we had and made the whole process smooth and stress-free. We would highly recommend. More

Conrad Roofing & Construction replaced my entire roof as well as repaired garage ceilings, gutters, etc and was absolutely top notch, great communication, and walked me through the entire process and completed the project on time and on … More
